data.enText: a view of a wide area of land

data.chText: 从旅馆可饱览峰峦叠嶂的雄伟景观。
data.enText: There is a superb panorama of the mountains from the hotel.

data.chText: （某专题或事件的）全面叙述，综合研究；全景画卷
data.enText: a description, study or set of pictures that presents all the different aspects or stages of a particular subject, event, etc.
a panoramic view over the valley

data.text: view ♦ sight ♦ scene ♦ vista ♦ panorama ♦ spectacle

data.chText: 以上各词均指景色，尤指从某处看到的风景。
data.enText: These are all words for a thing that you can see, especially from a particular place.
view

data.chText: 指从某处看到的景色、风景，尤指自然美景：
data.enText: what you can see from a particular place or position, especially beautiful natural scenery

data.chText: 这小屋可以看到宜人的海景。
data.enText: The cottage had a delightful sea view.
sight

data.chText: 指看见或看得见的事物、景象，尤指壮观、奇特的景象：
data.enText: a thing that you see or can see, especially sth that is impressive or unusual

data.chText: 一群红鹳飞向空中，景象十分壮观。
data.enText: It's a spectacular sight as the flamingos lift into the air.
scene

data.chText: 指景象、景色，尤指有人和／或动物活动的风光：
data.enText: a view that you see, especially one with people and/or animals moving about and doing things

data.chText: 那是赏心悦目的乡村风光。
data.enText: It was a delightful rural scene.
vista

data.chText: 指美景、狭长的景观，如树木或建筑物间的景观
data.enText: ( literary ) a beautiful view; a long, narrow view, for example between rows of trees or buildings
panorama
a view of a wide area of land

data.chText: 从塔上可看到壮丽的布拉格全景。
data.enText: The tower offers a breathtaking panorama of Prague.
spectacle
( literary ) a sight or view that is very impressive or attracts a lot of attention

data.chText: 成千上万的动物在辽阔的平原上活动构成了令人赞叹的奇观。
data.enText: The wide plain, with thousands of animals on the move, was an awesome spectacle.
a view/vista/panorama of/from…
a beautiful view/sight/scene/vista/panorama/spectacle
a spectacular view/sight/vista/panorama
a sad/sorry sight/scene/spectacle
an industrial/urban view/scene
to admire/take in the view/sight/scene/vista/panorama/spectacle

simple_means.memory_skill: pan 全 + oram 观看；景 + a → 全部看得到 → 全景

means: (某专题或事件的)全面叙述，综合研究

tr: a picture (or series of pictures) representing a continuous scene
the visual percept of a region
example: the most desirable feature of the park are the beautiful views

value.def: A panorama is a view in which you can see a long way over a wide area of land, usually because you are on high ground.

example.ex: Horton looked out over a panorama of fertile valleys and gentle hills.
example.tran: 霍顿向外望去，肥沃的谷地和平缓的丘陵尽收眼底。

value.def: A panorama is a broad view of a state of affairs or of a constantly changing series of events.

example.tran: 引人入胜的中世纪史概论

partsOfSpeech.dec: cosm 世界 + oram 观看；景 + a → 展示世界名胜景物的西洋镜
partsOfSpeech.d: 展示世界名胜景物的西洋镜

partsOfSpeech.dec: pan 全 + oram 观看；景 + a → 全部看得到 → 全景
pan 广泛的，全 + oram 观看；景 + ic …的 → 全景的
